name: Prison Colony: A Convict's Tale
description:
Life on Surrella is so good that the planet is starting to be overpopulated. As a solution, citizens may be convicted even for minor crimes and will be made to work on off-planet prison colonies. In this game, you play as a convict, trying to survive a series of missions. At the beginning, the missions involve construction tasks, but given that resources are tight, things soon turn violent.

  • Finish missions to earn raw materials
  • Defend your base when needed
  • Buy better vehicles (tanks, walking vehicles (WAVEs), or spacejets
  • Use your vehicles in combat missions
  • Escape the planet after building a spacejet
